Product Name: Christopher Backpack PM in Crocodilien Mat Black
Product Details for Site: Inspired by a Louis Vuitton travel bag designed in 1901, Nicolas Ghesquière created the City Steamer. This luxurious PM version is crafted of crocodilian leather. An heirloom-quality piece with a host of House signatures – engraved padlock, nametag, hot-stamped LV Circle – this model can be carried by hand, on the shoulder or cross-body.

Product Name: Clutch Thames in Crocodilien Mat Iceberg
Product Details for Site: An elegant new shape which combines form and function. In Epi leather with a refined metal closure, it features a gusseted compartment for enhanced capacity. Carry it under the arm or looped around the wrist thanks to its wrist strap for an on-trend urban look.

Product Name: Speedy Bandouliere 40 in Crocodilien Mat Titanium
Product Details for Site: For Fall-Winter 2018 Louis Vuitton revisits the iconic Speedy 40 bag in full crocodilian leather. The season’s signature Titanium hue lends a futuristic air to this sumptuous piece. Expertly crafted, with luxurious detailing that includes an adjustable croco strap, handles and name tag, this model is finished with the subtle gleam of Titanium-colored hardware.

Product Name: Steamer PM in Crocodilien Mat Noir
Product Details for Site: The elegant Steamer PM messenger bag is fashioned from a combination of exotic crocodilian leather and Monogram canvas. An update of Louis Vuitton’s classic steamer bag, it boasts signature House details as well as the new chain-and-pin closing system. It can be carried by hand using the top handle or hung across the body.

Product Name: Soft Trunk in Crocodilien Mat Blanc Lavable
Product Details for Site: Reimagined as a supple messenger bag, the Soft Trunk is ideal for on-the-go wear. It takes its style cues, such as the metallic corners, from classic luggage found in the Louis Vuitton archives. Along with the practical malleable construction, the matt-effect resin chain forming a section of the strap lends a modern edge.

Product Name: Neo Robusto in Crocodilien Mat Noir
Grand Sac in Crocodilien Mat Noir
Pochette Kasai in Crocodilien Mat Noir
Product Details for Site: Fashioned from glamorous crocodilian leather with a lining in supple goatskin, the compact Pochette Kasai is a stylishly practical way to transport everyday essentials. Its cleverly designed interior includes numerous credit-card slots and two flat pockets. It can be carried by hand or with the leather wristband.

Product Name: Utility Side Bag in Crocodilien Mat
Product Details for Site: The statement Utility side bag is part accessory, part garment and exudes House Artistic Director Virgil Abloh's youthful spirit. This bag fits close to the body and is ideal to carry around the city for convenient hands-free wear. Crafted from a choice of luxurious House materials, the zipped pouch has ample capacity for daily essentials.

Product Name: Capucines PM in Crocodilien Brilliant Blanc
Product Details for Site: This exceptional Capucines PM is fashioned of crocodilian leather, superbly worked by Louis Vuitton craftsmen. Precious materials and signature details make this model a glamorous bag for daytime wear. It is also a refined choice for business use, thanks to the well-organized, goatskin-lined interior and removable shoulder strap.

Product Name: Capucines Mini in Crocodilien Brilliant Rose Kyoto
Product Details for Site: This precious Capucines Mini is crafted of crocodilian leather. Lined with luxurious goatskin and fitted with gleaming metal hardware, it features the distinctive Capucines flap, which can be tucked in to display the LV signature, or worn outside to reveal a Monogram Flower. Its petite dimensions make this exceptional piece a splendid choice for evening.

Product Name: City Steamer MM in Crocodilien Brilliant Gris Perle
Product Details for Site: Nicolas Ghesquière created the City Steamer, inspired by Louis Vuitton luggage designed for cruise-ship passengers in 1901. Made of luxurious crocodilian leather polished to a high luster, this heirloom-quality edition features new signature twists: an engraved padlock, nametag and hot-stamped LV Circle. With ample room for paperwork and a removable shoulder strap, it is an ideal day-to-business bag.

Product Name: City Steamer PM in Crocodilien Brilliant Emeraude

Product Name: Alma BB in Crocodilien Brilliant Noir
Product Details for Site: Exceptional craftsmanship has fashioned the iconic shape of the Alma BB out of exotic crocodile leather. Delightfully compact, this simple yet elegant bag is the ideal size to carry the daily essentials

Product Name: Alma PM in Crocodilien Brilliant Grenade
Alma BB in Crocodilien Brilliant Grenade
Product Details for Site: Exceptional craftsmanship has fashioned the iconic shape of the Alma BB out of exotic crocodile leather. Delightfully compact, this simple yet elegant bag is the ideal size to carry the daily essentials

Product Name: Milla PM in Crocodilien Brilliant Blue
Product Details for Site: Crafted from luxurious Veau Nuage calfskin, the ladylike Milla PM is the definition of a refined city bag. A host of subtle signatures announces its pedigree: the metal lockplate, key, rivets and leather side bows all refer to features on classic Louis Vuitton trunks. With twin handles and a removable strap, the Milla can be carried in any number of ways.

Product Name: Go-14 PM in Crocodilien Mat Bleu
Product Details for Site: The GO-14 in precious karung leather beautifully combines stylish refinement with discreet sophistication. The elegant gold sliding chain is the perfect final touch, turning this into a true must-have. The clever wave base design makes it surprisingly roomy.

Product Name: Petite Boite Chapeau in Crocodilien Mat Rose Mordore
Product Details for Site: The most feminine of travel accessories – the iconic hatbox – is reimagined as a covetable handbag in precious shiny crocodile leather. Small yet practical (it fits an iPhone 7) thanks to its distinctive shape, the audacious little handbag can be carried by an adjustable top handle or a long removable strap.

Product Name: Brea PM in Crocodilien Brilliant
Petite Malle in Crocodilien Mat Noir
Product Details for Site: Nicolas Ghesquière reimagined the iconic fittings of historic House trunks to create the Petite Malle handbag. This extraordinary edition is offered in luxurious crocodilian leather, with a shimmering finish that further enhances the skin's natural beauty. Lined with lambskin and accented with polished hardware, this covetable “little trunk” travels elegantly from day into night.

Product Name: Capucines Long Wallet in Crocodilien Brilliant Rubis
Product Details for Site: Matching the emblematic Capucines bag, this elegant wallet is given a sophisticated twist by a row of golden studs and eyelets, which create a jewel effect along the flap. Its sleek design is large enough to hold all the daily essentials.

Product Name: Capucines Compact Wallet in Crocodilien Brilliant Rose Kyoto
Product Details for Site: The Capucines Compact Wallet is made from supple Taurillon leather and adorned with gold-color flower crowns composed of Monogram blossoms. The golden motif stands out against the grained leather of this flap wallet, which opens to a variety of pockets and credit-card slots.

Product Name: Zippy Coin Purse in Crocodilien Mat Rose Fuchsia
Product Details for Site: The classic form of this Zippy Coin Purse has been crafted in exquisitely supple crocodilian leather. Compact and yet extremely practical thanks to the ingeniously designed interior, the multifunction coin purse perfectly fuses functionality with elegance.

Product Name: Capucines PM in Autruche Menthe
Product Details for Site: An emblematic Louis Vuitton bag, the Capucines PM in monochrome Taurillon leather brings glamour to any outfit. The distinctive design and shape are the perfect reflection of the House’s vision of contemporary style.

Product Name: Capucines BB in Python Gradient Red
Product Details for Site: The Capucines BB handbag is crafted from exotic python skin as part of the exceptional Stained Glass finish. Metallic color is applied by hand to the precious leather to create a beautiful dégradé effect, which complements the feminine design of this bag with its iconic LV Initials signature.

Product Name: Capucines BB in Python Orange Gold Stained
Product Details for Site: The Capucines BB handbag is crafted from exotic python skin as part of the exceptional Stained Glass finish. Metallic color is applied by hand to the precious leather to create a beautiful dégradé effect, which complements the feminine design of this bag with its iconic LV Initials signature.

Product Name: Capucines Mini in Python Vert Argent
Product Details for Site: Fashioned from full-grain Taurillon leather, the now-classic Capucines Mini handbag displays a host of House signatures: leather-wrapped LV Initials, jewel-like handle mounts inspired by historic trunks, and a distinctive flap with a Monogram Flower motif. This model features a handle crafted from luxe python skin – a sophisticated touch. First launched in 2013, the Capucines is named for the Parisian street where Louis Vuitton first opened shop, in 1854.

Product Name: Capucines BB in Python Gold
Product Details for Site: The Capucines BB handbag is crafted from exotic python skin as part of the exceptional Stained Glass finish. Metallic color is applied by hand to the precious leather to create a beautiful dégradé effect, which complements the feminine design of this bag with its iconic LV Initials signature.

Product Name: Capucines Mini in Python Gold Silver
Product Details for Site: Fashioned from full-grain Taurillon leather, the now-classic Capucines Mini handbag displays a host of House signatures: leather-wrapped LV Initials, jewel-like handle mounts inspired by historic trunks, and a distinctive flap with a Monogram Flower motif. This model features a handle crafted from luxe python skin – a sophisticated touch. First launched in 2013, the Capucines is named for the Parisian street where Louis Vuitton first opened shop, in 1854.

Product Name: Capucines Mini in Python Rose Mordore
Product Details for Site: Pink takes on a golden luster on this Capucines Mini handbag in exotic python leather. The leather is first dyed then polished by hand to give this little bag its fresh feminine feel. Distinctive House details like the LV closure and studded handle rings complete this exquisite bag.

Product Name: Capucines BB in Python Bleu Silver Stained
Product Details for Site: The Capucines BB handbag is crafted from exotic python skin as part of the exceptional Stained Glass finish. Metallic color is applied by hand to the precious leather to create a beautiful dégradé effect, which complements the feminine design of this bag with its iconic LV Initials signature.

Product Name: Capucines Mini in Python Fuchsia
Product Details for Site: This season, the Capucines Mini handbag is reinterpreted in stylish pink metallic python leather. The exquisite snakeskin pattern is accentuated by a burst of silver stenciled on the exotic leather. As always, the Capucines’ top handle, studded side rings and LV signature bring a feel of discreet yet sophisticated luxury.

Product Name: Petite Boite Chapeau in Python Degrade Marron
Product Details for Site: The most feminine of travel accessories – the iconic hatbox – is reimagined as a covetable handbag in precious shiny python leather. Small yet practical (it fits an iPhone 7) thanks to its distinctive shape, the audacious little handbag can be carried by an adjustable top handle or a long removable strap.

Product Name: Twist Wallet in Python Naturel
Product Details for Site: This special edition of the Twist wallet is crafted from precious python skin with a deep-blue gradient effect, which demonstrates Louis Vuitton's leather goods knowhow. It is achieved by first dyeing the skin in the lighter color, than hand-spraying the scales. This elegant design is signed with the iconic LV turn-lock in gold-tone metal.

Product Name: Porte Cartes Simple in Python Rose Mordore
Product Details for Site: The Neo Porte Cartes in very masculine supple python leather is a sophisticated way to carry essential cards. It slips easily into a jacket or pants pocket.

Product Name: Porte Cartes Simple in Python Fuchsia
Product Details for Site: The Neo Porte Cartes in very masculine supple python leather is a sophisticated way to carry essential cards. It slips easily into a jacket or pants pocket.

Product Name: Twist PM in Lizard Emeraude
Product Details for Site: The Twist PM in luxurious crocodilian leather exhibits exquisite craftsmanship. Lined with goatskin and set off by a gleaming LV Twist lock, the bag is roomier than it looks, thanks to a cleverly designed “wave” base. The sliding chain handle features a croco-leather pad, and can be worn on the shoulder or cross-body. A precious piece, ideal for evening.

Product Name: LV Egg Bag in Lizard Rouge
Product Details for Site: For the Spring-Summer 2019 show Nicolas Ghesquière imagined a minaudière-like handbag in a perfect ovoid shape: the LV Egg. This model fashioned entirely from luxe lizard skin tells a bold bicolor story. It makes a strong style statement, carries by hand or suspended from its link chain.

Product Name: Capucines Mini in Lizard Pearly Pink
Product Details for Site: This season, the adorable Capucines Mini handbag comes in vibrant-color lizard skin with gold-tone hardware. The bright pink colorway has a pearly treatment that testifies to Louis Vuitton’s expertise with exotic leathers. The semi-wrapped LV Initials and the studded rings that secure top handle finish this classic handbag.

Product Name: Minaudiere in Lizard Rose Mordore
